name: Fjallraven Lada Sweater - Men's
description: The Lada proves that a great wool sweater is timeless. A shawl collar adds a touch of style, and the soft wool blend keeps you warm even if you get caught in the rain.Folded half-collar can be turned up for an extra bit of protection from the elements.Dual corozo button closure at the collar helps you control the temperature.Soft fine wool blend is warm and comfy, not warm and itchy.Regular fit, so you get no surprises, just comfort.
